txt.en: 'You should return to Tinnudir and speak with Orchalwë. He will be pleased to hear about our progress here in Ost Heryn. If I am correct, with the issues here resolved, the Twilight Fields are silent for the first night in a very long time.'

'Ost Heryn is silent, and the fields are peaceful. This is a great day, and one that would be celebrated were there not so much more to do. Annúminas, the Way of Kings, the Eavespires... all are in need of aid. Our inaction here for so long has left a great deal to do. First, however, we must look to the north and Ost Forod.'
'Talk to Orchalwë on the isle of Tinnudir.'
The fields of Evendim, also called the Twilight Fields, feature several estates and an ancient fortress. After much hard work, all of them have been reclaimed for the Rangers.
Orchalwë is at Tinnudir, west of Torogethir's camp.\n\nOrchalwë will be pleased to hear that the problems at Ost Heryn have been resolved.
